data.title: Add scons custom extra suffix
data.body:
makes it possible to add a custom extra suffix to the base filename of all generated binary files.

example :
`scons p=windows extra_suffix=yourBranchName`
or
`scons p=windows bits=32 extra_suffix=v20150401_1642`
or
`scons p=windows extra_suffix=msvc2010_git20150401`

data.title: add_scons_custom_extra_suffix_option
data.body:
make it possible to add a custom extra suffix to the base filename of all generated binary files.

example :
`scons p=windows bits=32 extra_suffix=v20150401_1642`
or
`scons p=widnows extra_suffix=yourBranchName`

data.title: Empty MeshInstance: Mesh Menue crashes Godot
data.body: If you add a MeshInstance to the project tree (without adding a mesh), open the mesh menue in the viewport and select any of the menu items godot will crash.

data.title: KinematicBody2D did not collide when I use it as scene file.
data.body:
KinematicBody2D did not collide with StaticBody,KinematicBody,RigidBody when I use it as scene file.
but it works in a scene.
I use my character as a module so I can use it in different scene.
But I get this problem.
This is my test project, you can check out to see the problem.

I set the wrong shape, close

data.title: Bullet Shower demo crashes after repeated collision with bullet objects
data.body:
To reproduce...
- Open and play 'Bullet Shower' from the Godot demo pack
- Run into as many bullets as you can, when the face switches states for the third or fourth time, the demo will crash

The console also will not show any error in particular, just an expletive and the word "no error"

This bug confirmed on a Win64 MingW debug build from the 25th of March. Hopefully this can be fixed.

data.title: (Fix crash) in visual shader for curve remap node
data.body: Should not crash godot anymore when adding a keypoint and deleting it while still holding mouse button down.

data.title: (Crash fix) script will not be able to extend itself
data.body: Crash fix - edtior will no longer crash when a script is trying to extend itself. This fixes #1572

data.title: New node will be added to root node if nothing is selected
data.body: When a user adds a new node when no node is selected - the new node will be added as a child of the root node.

data.title: [1.1 rc2]:platform3d Particle shows bad
data.body: In godot 1.1beta1  ,I found the platform3d demo shows a wrong particle display in bullet scene .It seems alpha not working .. Particle system updated lately . Is demo out of date? I am sorry for my bad english .

data.title: Add an optional mechanism to detect infinite loops in gdscript
data.body:
Hi,

It would quite reassuring if the debug version of godot had some sort of watchdog timer or any other optional mechanism that would detect and warn about infinite or way-too-long loops in gdscript.

data.title: script node
data.body:
Ok, i was thinking about node made to receive a script resource, so i can, for example make a jump script to the a game and even use it in another game, with just small changes.
Of course, i can just make a simple node and put the "jump" script on it... But the script node could have some exclusive resources
1 - since the idea of a script node it's to add a "sub-script" to the node, the notion of self can be the get_parent (and you have to use other path to refer to the script itself) so if you just type get_pos it's the parent position
2 - it can have a handle to activate or deactivate the whole script, so i can just deactivate the jump of a char by deactivating the jump script
3 - maybe some inheritance of the parent script?

data.title: add : bool Object.is_queued_for_deletion()
data.body:
This adds an `Object.is_queued_for_deletion()` method which returns true if the object has just been
`object.queue_free()` or `SceneTree.queue_delete(object)`.

( note : of course, the object must have not been deleted already. )

data.title: Error with Front image of CubeMap (maybe a storage problem)
data.body:
I try to make a cube map, using a version compiled with last commits, and CubeMap tool appears broken! When I load image on Front slot, the editor raise a error:
ERROR: texture_set_data: Condition ' texture->format != p_image.get_format() ' is true.
   At: drivers/gles2/rasterizer_gles2.cpp:951.

The others images of cube are fine.

This is the original image file

![front](https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/85936/6879433/cbdaa6e2-d4d3-11e4-8a02-857d3fbdc4b7.png)

data.title: setget and yield() vanished from wiki documentation ?
data.body:
Hi,

I'm not 100% sure it was really there at some time in the past, but it seems that the "setget" keyword documentation has vanished from the wiki gdscript documentation.

data.title: version
[CRASH] Adding tiles without a NavigationPolygon to a tilemap where some of the tiles has crashes the editor
data.body:
Hi. 
I've wanted to implement pathfinding to my game and I noticed by looking at the source code, that a tilemap looks for a parent node of the type "Navigation2D".
I went on and added navigation polygons on the walk-able tiles of my map(its a top-down game) and exported the tiles as a .xml tileset. 
Then I added a tilemap as a child of a Navigation2D node. 

I can add the tiles containing a NavigationPolygon to the map just fine, but my game crashes when I try to add a tile without one. 
Here's a picture of my setup: 
![udklip](https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/11670799/6857118/e4709da8-d404-11e4-85cb-a3ab8a0b75ea.PNG)

I am using my own compilation which I build the 22/03/15. 

EDIT: 
I am running the 64-bit build on a windows 7 laptop.

setting as background color for the EditorHelp.

data.body: How about adding texture system as seen in this video https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=d3SSBeVpaVE ? I think it would be really cool atleast for one open source engine to leave outdated tiling system.

data.title: Improvements in EditorPlugin
data.body:
Simple additions to EditorPlugin:
1. **get_selected_node**:
   That will return the current selected, or active node.
2. **get_editor_icon(name)**:
   That will return the icon with the given name. For example, in icons folder, the icon 
   "icon_tool_scale.png", it name will be "ToolScale".
3. **create_node(node)**.

And better toolbar containers:
1. **CONTAINER_LEFT_TOOLBAR**
2. **CONTAINER_RIGHT_TOOLBAR**

data.title: fixes_3d_spot_attenuation
data.body: in 3d spotlights, there was a confusion between `attenuation` and `spot_attenuation`, and between `VS::LIGHT_PARAM_ATTENUATION` and `VS::LIGHT_PARAM_SPOT_ATTENUATION`

data.title: Tilemap accept only .xml tileset
data.body:
I am following this [tutorial](https://github.com/okamstudio/godot/wiki/tutorial_tilemap).

And so I have export the tileset with the extension .res but when I try to load it in the TileMap it do nothing. However, if I export it with the .xml extension it's working properly.

Is it intended ?

I am using Godot 1.0.

data.title: "extends" on the same script causes a crash
data.body:
Lets say you got a script
"res:///testlevel1.gd"

the engine will crash (segfault) if you extend the script from itself.

extends "res://testlevel1.gd"

I know that there is no valid reason to do so (I made this cause of a typo) but this error should maybe be caught.

data.title: 2D screen space shaders corrupted with stretch_mode=viewport or fullscreen
data.body:
Running the screen space shaders example, if I change the `stretch_mode` to "viewport" and then resize the window, the shader becomes corrupted:

![Screenshot](https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/7063628/godot-sss/Screen-Space%20Shaders_001.png)

I was trying to use a screen space shader for an effect. It looks fine in the editor, but my game uses the "viewport" stretch mode and a test_width/test_height that are half the size of my screen. Under those conditions, when the game is run the shader graphic was always corrupted. I was also seeing the shader become corrupted after using `OS.set_window_fullscreen()` .

Using git version a12c364489df586bf3cbb38f613c0615f88eaff1 on Ubuntu 14.10.
